message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value.  While I can't disclose the exact details at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer ready to purchase it for $1200000 if you decline.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss further details.
